item.description:
Today we learn:

  • Kabbalah origins, foundations and sources.
  • Types of Kabbalah.
  • Is there a Jewish prophet without Kabbalah?
  • The purpose of creation, the purpose of man.
  • Free will and the soul power.
  • Shattered vessels and human responsibility.
  • Why prayers are not always answered?


Meditation:


  • Types of kabbalistic meditations
  • Meditation as the path in Kabbalah.
  • Arayot (sexuality), Ma'aseh Bereshith ('Work of Creation') and Ma'azeh Merkavah ('Discipline of the Chariot'): who can learn?
  • How were prophetic states attained
  • 'I' in exile.
  • Hitbodedut.
  • Letters as meditative means, letters as creative energies.
  • Breath and letters meditation


Please bring your notebooks and pens. Snacks and tea provided. Look forward to seeing you.

Please email me if you need financial arrangements, or can't use paypal.
item.name: Origins of Kabbalah. Kabbalah and Prophecy. Creator, Creation and Man.
